name: League of Arab People Organization
headAddress: 446 El Haram St., Nasr El Din Towers
bossPosition: The chairman of League of Arab People organization
goal:
League of Arab People organization accredited to the UN, EU and UN Global compact, It has many ambassadors all over the Arab countries
we participated in the Conference of anti religious terrorism in the Netherlands, the conference of listen to Africa to solve the problems of Africa on the European Parliament, the International Human Rights Conference in Lebanon, the International Compact for Media in Lebanon and many other conferences
It works to discuss the problems of the Arab countries and to conduct studies to solve them And present these solutions to officials
Defending human rights, the Arab nation and the care of women and disabled children
Attention to Arab communities abroad and their problems and trying to solve them
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: We  attended the conference of listen to Africa to solve the problems of Africa on the European Parliament
